notfound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notfound.content: The requested page could not be found.

server-error.title: 500 - Internal Server Error
server-error.content: Something went wrong on our server. We have received a notification about it and will try to resolve it as soon as possible. Please, try again later.

contact.NAME_TOO_SHORT: The name needs to be at least {{ min }} characters long.
contact.INVALID_EMAIL: You have provided an invalid email.
contact.SUBJECT_TOO_SHORT: The subject needs to be at least {{ min }} characters long.
contact.MESSAGE_TOO_SHORT: The message needs to be at least {{ min }} characters long.
